name: Island Survival (itch) (CrazySheep05)
description:
You are on an island, and as luck would have it, it is about to go through 3 disasters, with you on it.

Each game, the island is randomly generated and rendered using marching cubes

The game in in a very early state, so there are no sounds, some bugs and a few glitches when pausing during a disaster.

The game runs quite well on my really old laptop so requirments seem quite low. The marching cube algorithm has gone through several optimisations, but I still have ideas to speed it up further.
